input_data_option_choose_1.title: Input data option (choose 1)
input_data_option_choose_1.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data using either an input samplesheet or an input directory.

input.description: Path to comma-separated file containing information about the samples in the experiment.
input.help_text: You will need to create a design file with information about the samples in your experiment before running the pipeline. Use this parameter to specify its location. It has to be a comma-separated file with 3 columns, and a header row.

fastq_pass.description: Path to directory containing either barcoded fastq files or individually named fastq files
fastq_pass.help_text: Barcodes must be formatted as 'barcode##' to be found. Fastq files must end in '.fastq' or '.fastq.gz'

important_input_values.description: Important pipeline values for that are based on which variant caller is being used along with if any metadata is to be added
important_input_values.title: Important input values

variant_caller.description: Choose which variant caller to use. Options are 'medaka', 'clair3', and 'nanopolish'

metadata.description: Path to metadata TSV file containing at least columns 'sample' and 'barcode'

fast5_pass.description: Path to directory containing fast5 files for nanopolish

sequencing_summary.description: Path to sequencing_summary file needed for nanopolish

variant_model_settings.title: Variant model settings
variant_model_settings.description: Settings pertaining to the specific variant callers models. Be as accurate as possible for best results

medaka_model.description: Model to use in medaka. See medaka docs for more info

clair3_model.description: Model to use in clair3. See clair3 docs for more info

clair3_user_variant_model.description: Path to local clair3 model folder

clair3_no_pool_split.description: Pass to not split amplicon pools when running clair3

read_filtering_options.title: Read filtering options
read_filtering_options.description: Options pertaining to how to filter reads

min_reads.description: Minimum reads required to run the sample after length filtering

scheme_options.title: Scheme options
scheme_options.description: Options pertaining to the amplicon sequencing scheme. Scheme directories must include '*.scheme.bed' and '*.reference.fasta'

reference.description: Path to local reference file to map to instead of using a primer scheme

scheme.description: Name of the pathogen to look for a scheme to use

scheme_repo.description: URL to the online scheme git repo to download

local_scheme.description: Path to local scheme repo use instead of downloading

artic_minion_options.title: Artic minion options
artic_minion_options.description: Options pertaining to the steps in the artic minion pipeline

no_frameshift.description: If passed, skip detected frameshift variants

use_bwa.description: If passed, use BWA insead of minimap2 for read mapping

skip_longshot.description: If passed, skip running longshot with medaka pipeline

use_artic_tool.description: Pass to run tool artic pipeline instead of the nextflow adaptation this pipeline uses

snpeff_options.title: SnpEff options
snpeff_options.description: Options pertaining to running SnpEff for variant annotation

gff.description: Path to gff3 formatted file to be used to build SnpEff database

skip_qc.description: If passed, skip running all QC and reporting steps

pcr_primer_bed.description: Path to PCR Primer bed to check for any mutations occuring in defined regions

neg_control_threshold.description: Float threshold for a negative control sample to be considered contaminated

neg_ctrl_substrings.description: Control prefixes separated by a ',' to determine which samples are negative controls

report_generation_options.title: Report generation options
report_generation_options.description: Options pertaining to final report generation

custom_report.description: Create custom report instead of the MultiQC report (singularity not yet supported for custom reports)

multiqc_config_overall.description: MultiQC overall run config yaml file

generic_options.title: Generic options
generic_options.description: Less common options for the pipeline, typically set in a config file.
generic_options.help_text: These options are generic and don't quite all under any other categories

outdir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved. You have to use absolute paths to storage on Cloud infrastructure.

cache.help_text: Path to directory to store or find environments/containers
cache.description: Path to directory containing env/container shared store

monochrome_logs.description: Do not use coloured log outputs.

max_memory.description: Maximum memory to use in pipeline for a single process. Given as a string with int.GB

max_cpus.description: Maximum number of CPUs available to use for a single process

max_time.description: Maximum time available for a single process to run with
